pages.title: 404 Not Found
pages.text: 404 很抱歉，您访问的页面不存在 可能是输入地址有误或该地址已被删除

posts.title: git clone 报错
posts.excerpt: RPC failed; curl 18 transfer closed with outstanding read data remainingfatal: The remote end hung up unexpectedly
posts.text: RPC failed; curl 18 transfer closed with outstanding read data remainingfatal: The remote end hung up unexpectedly git clone 错误由于资源太大或者网络连接速度太慢导致clone出错，错误信息12RPC failed; curl 18 transfer closed with outstanding read data remainingfatal: The remote end hung up unexpectedly 解决办法1.调整git服务配置1.1 调整缓存1git config http.postBuffer 524288000 1.2 调整网络速度限制12git config http:lowSpeedLimit 0git config http:lowSpeedTime 999999 1.3 git config 配置层次在执行git config 命令时可以指定配置所属的层级（系统、全局、本地） 123456(1)系统配置 --system系统级配置文件是 /etc/gitconfig 是所有用户共同拥有的git配置。使用git config --system 可以编辑(2)全局配置 --global全局级配置文件一般是在当前用户的～/.gitconfig 属于当前用户的git配置。使用 git config --global 可以编辑(3)本地配置 --local本地配置文件一般在当前仓库目录下的.git/config 只属于当前仓库的配置。使用git config --local可以编辑 2. 分批clone12345(1) 浅层clonegit clone https://github.com/XXXX --depth 1(2) 获取剩余cd XXXXgit fetch --unshallow 2.1 浅层克隆123git clone https://github.com/XXXX --depth 1--depth 表示克隆深度，为1时表示克隆最新一次的commit 2.2 获取剩余提交123git fetch --unshallow或者git pull --unshallow

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Hello World Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
